CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 20, 1951, pg. 5, reads: "Jury Says Manslaughter - Willoughby (Luke) Taulton, 24-year-old Clairton war veteran, is led from Judge Harry M. Montgomery's courtroom Tuesday by Deputy Sheriff Fred Pica during a recess in his trial before a jury of eight women and four men. Taulton, charged with the fatal shooting last Aug. 31 of Morris Brown College grid star, Robert Hirt Jr., also of Clairton.  The jury deliberated several hours Tuesday and then found Taulton guilty of voluntary manslaughter."
TitMainTitle: Deputy Sheriff Fred Pica escorting Willoughby "Luke" Taulton through corridor at Allegheny County Courthouse during trial recess
